modName: The Gray Village - Dunmer Village Mod
summary: Creates a Dunmer village in the Rift
descriptionHtml:
[color=#DB7900][center][b][size=26]The Gray Village[/size][/b][/center][/color]
[color=#DB7900][center][b][size=20]by Helix341[/size][/b][/center][/color]

[img]http://i1102.photobucket.com/albums/g449/Helix341/Fight.jpg[/img]

[color=red][b][size=3] If you like the mod, please either comment or endorse the mod - It lets me know how the mod is doing and what needs to be improved! Thanks! [/size][/b][/color]

[center][u]Story[/u][/center]
[center]The Atheron family and Ambarys Rendar, being the richest Dark Elves in Windhelm,
managed to buy large amounts of building materials from questionable sources in
Riften, and relocated all the Dunmer out of Windhelm. Other Dunmer from around 
Skyrim joined them, and now the village is fully self-sufficient. (In the New 
Atheron Residence, there is a book written by Suvaris Atheron which contains an 
account of the creation of the village - by the enchanting table)[/center]

[center][u]Buildings[/u]
*New Atheron Residence: The Atherons live here, along with the Thalmor Advisor.
Enchanting Table and Alchemy Lab available, as well as an Enchanting Skill book.
*The Burnt Dunmer Cornerclub: Ambarys Rendar\'s new inn. Rentable room, as well as food/
drink - and a special room...
*The Glimmering Moonstone: The village blacksmith. Crafting equipment: Forge,
Tanning Rack, Workbench and Grindstone. There is plenty of loot inside the house,
mainly elven weapons and armor.
*Sadri\'s Magnificent Wares: Revyn Sadri\'s new shop. Same services as before, but
in a new building. There is also a Shrine to Zenithar
*Hlaalu Farm: Belyn Hlaalu has given his old farm to Adisla, and has set up his
new farm in the Gray Village. As befits his family name, he has been given a great
Elven Sword, and is highly respected by other Dunmer.
*Shrine to Azura: No Dunmer village would be complete without a tribute to Azura. 
The Dunmer have recreated the Statue of Azura, and a priest has settled there.
*Hunters Camp: A short walk away from the village lies a small camp, with a chest
filled with hunting loot.

[u]New NPCS[/u]
*Alanyis Atheron: Aval\'s wife, she was living in a cave with her daughter after the 
Windhelm authorities took a dislike to her. She has now joined Aval once again.
(Vendor - Spells)
*Duthyl Atheron: Has been raised by her mother, but now serves as the Chief of the
Dunmer guards, and protects her father, Aval Atheron. However, she longs for the
days when she roamed Skyrim, and may be able to be persuaded to follow a worthy
adventurer. (Follower)
*Thanyir Atheron: Duthyl\'s husband, and the village blacksmith. He took Duthyl\'s 
name because, being an illigitimate child, he had no family name. 
(Vendor - Blacksmith)
*Azyl Hlaalu: The priestess of Azura and mother of Thanyir, she came to visit her 
son\'s wife, but decided to stay as she liked the village. She has also taken a bit 
of a fancy towards Belyn Hlaalu...and so decided to marry him!
*Sanila Sadri: Revyn\'s vampire sister was on the run from prejudiced Nords, but was
offered shelter in the village. She aids Revyn with the shop - just don\'t pick a
fight with her! (Vendor - Misc)
*Dunmer Refugees: These Dunmer are staying at the inn until they can afford to 
return to Morrowind. 
*Anunil (Thalmor Advisor): After Elenwen heard of the Dunmer\'s rejection of the Nords,
she felt compelled to help her fellow Mer. At least that\'s what she says - this 
advisor is here to try to convince the Atherons to join the Dominion and oppose the
Empire.
*Dunmer Guards: These Dark Elves used to be in the Dark Elf Army, but have fled
after the Argonian invasion. Now their military training is in use once again, as
Aval Atheron has employed them to protect the village from threats.
*Thalmor Guards: Anunil has brought two additional troops to the village, who have
joined the guard, and help to protect the village.
*Hunters: A short walk from the village will bring you to a small hunter camp,
where three hunters (2 Bosmer, 1 Dunmer) kill game to feed the Gray Village.
(Vendors - Hunter)
*Vorka Ork-Kin: Hireling/Potential Spouse in the Burnt Dunmer Cornerclub (Version 1.1)

[color=blue][b]MORE TO BE ADDED LATER![/b][/color]

[u]Installation:[/u]
-Use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager]Nexus Mod Manager[/url]
or
-Using [url=http://www.7-zip.org]7zip[/url] or a similar program, extract contents of 7z file into a temporary location, and then copy GrayVillage.esp into your data folder
-Make sure that it is enabled in your Data Files section in the Launcher.

[u]Bugs[/u]
*Revyn Sadri may not enter dialogue with you, making it impossible for you to trade
with him - however, Sanila can be traded with, so you do not miss out upon general
goods trading.
*Same applies with Alanyis Atheron.
*Blacksmith may spawn underneath his house.
*Followers cannot follow you into any new buildings.
*Some of the packages may not work properly, I believe that this is a Creation Kit
bug - this mainly applies to Ambarys Rendar and Aval Atheron (They seem to wander 
in the wrong places a bit).
*Please report any if you find any!

NOTE: I don\'t know what is causing the listed bugs, and I do not know how to fix
them! If you have any ideas, please let me know, either by private message or by
posting in the comments. Thanks!

[u]Incompatibilities[/u]
*Will not be compatible with any mods that edit the area, or mods that edit
these NPCs: Aval Atheron, Faryl Atheron, Suvaris Atheron, Malthyr Enthil, Ambarys
Rendar, Belyn Hlaalu, Revyn Sadri or Adisla. I Haven\'t heard of any mods that do 
this, but is probably wise to check!

[u]FAQ[/u]
Please ask questions in the comments section, and I will answer them, and add any
that are asked a lot here!

[u]Changelog[/u]
Version 1.0
*The first version!

Version 1.1
*Fixed the grey face bug
*New NPC (See NPC list)
*Renamed Burnt Dunmer for lore purposes

Version 1.2
*Move Burnt Dunmer so that Dawnguard Quest \"The Bloodstone Chalice\" is not broken (NOTE: DOES NOT REQUIRE DAWNGUARD, IS JUST COMPATIBLE)

[u]Future Updates[/u]
*Fix Bugs
*New NPCs
*New Buildings
*Possible Market
*A Couple of Miscellaneous quests.

[u]Permissions[/u]
If you want to do anything with this mod, please ask me, and I will tell you what
you can and can\'t do. I am generally lenient, I\'d just like to be asked first![/center]

[center][color=red][b]Enjoy! Please comment and endorse if you like it![/b][/color][/center]

[img]http://i1102.photobucket.com/albums/g449/Helix341/SanilaAttacks.jpg[/img]
author: Helix341
